segments.text: As I watch the water overflow from the sink, I feel a mounting sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreading across the floor looks treacherous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about the damage this could cause, not just to the kitchen but to the woman’s peace of mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is so engaged in her task, blissfully ignorant of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s an unsettling beauty to this domestic scene: the busy kitchen against the calm garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman ever takes a moment to breathe, to look around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a ticking time bomb, and I can’t help but bristle at the thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything looks so perfect on the outside, yet inside it's a potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach out and tell her to fix the faucet, to save her from herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But all I can do is observe this scene unfold, helplessly.
segments.speaker: PAR
